items.title: Paper accepted in Statistical Papers
items.content: Our paper 'Drift parameter identification for the Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process driven by Ornstein-Uhlenbeck with small General Gaussian noise' has been accepted for publication in Statistical Papers.

items.title: Joined the Department of Statistics
items.content: I joined the Department of Statistics at Pontificia Universidad Cat√≥lica de Chile as an Assistant Professor.
